name: Carnivorous Bioexperiment
subtitle: Derailed combat entity test
setup: Place the Monster in Vault X

abilities.name: Wary
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked in Dark Sections

instructions: At the end of any Resolve phase, must Down a Live Colocated Human if possible
If none, then the acting player must Step with Carnivorous Bioexperiment one Section closer to the closest Live Human. If tied, the player may choose which Section step to
Carnivorous Bioexperiment defends like an Unhelmet Human and if Downed by hazards. Carnivorous Bioexperiment has Self-Preservation, if the only valid move is through a Hazard it will not move

name: Combat Swarm
subtitle: Remote control murder drones
setup: Place the Monster in Vault X
Place the Direct Swarm token under Console Actions

abilities.name: Agile
abilities.description: Can move up to two Sections with a single Step. Can Step through Vents.

abilities.name: Jury Rig
abilities.description: As an action, Repair a Colocated Damaged Section or Robot

instructions: Combat Swarm is controlled with the Console Actions. It can only Step (including Drag), Attack, or Juri Rig. It attacks as though it has a Gun
It cannot be Downed unless it enters undamaged Magnetic Containment, wherein it is Downed inmediately.
You cannot become Suspect doing Actions with Combat Swarm
Combat Swarm is a Robot and can be Downed Repaired and ignores hazards. Counts as Robot for scoring purposes.

name: Death Ray
subtitle: Fully operational battle station
setup: Place Death Ray token in Array Control
instructions: Death Ray can be fired as an Action by any Human or Robot in Array Control. Death Ray cannot fire if Reactor or Array Control are Damaged. Firing Death Ray Damages Reactor
Death Ray can target Offsites, Rescue/Pirate Ship and launched Pods. Anything targeted by Death Ray is Annihilated and is removed from the game along with everythin on it
Guilty players return to Suspect if Authorities are Annihilated. Using the Death Ray does not trigger Suspicion

name: Entropy Phantom
subtitle: An engergy ghost
setup: Place the Monster in Vault X
instructions: At the end of any Resolve Phase, the acting player must move a cube from a Colocated Character to Betrayal if possible (it's eating their memories!)

If there are no cubes, the acting player must Step Entropy Phantom on Section closer to Antimatter if available. If it reaches Antimatter, arm it if isn't already, and Annihilated Entropy Phantom. If Antimatter is Annihilated, instead Step Entropy Phantom towards Magnetic Containment
Entropy Phantom cannot be Downed
Any Data Colocated with Entropy Phantom is immediately Deleted

name: Grey Goo
subtitle: Expanding nano-slime
setup: Give Grey Go card to the acting plater
Note that Goo spreads by placing Grey Goo marker on card at value 0. This show the Grey Goo spread
instructions: At the end of the Resolve Phase of the player holding the card, Goo affects any Character in Sections within its spread by Annihilating a Helmet in their possession or Downing them if they have no Helmet
Then, increase the spread by one if not in Blackout. Any Section that number of section away from Vault X is now within its spread
Goo spreads through Locks but not Vents
If the spread reaches 5, proceed to Stationfall

name: Robotic Assassin
subtitle: Implacable Killbot
setup: Place the Monster in Vault X
Place the Mark Target token in Console Actions
The acting player places Target token on a Live Unescaped Human or Robot Pawn

abilities.name: Juggernaut
abilities.description: Can Step through Locks (which removes them)

instructions: The Mark Target Console Action moves the Target Token to a Live Unescaped Human or Robot pawn
At the end of any Resolve Phase, Robotic Assassin must Down a Colocated Human or Robot that has the Target Token on them
If none, the player must Step Robotic Assassin on Section closer to any Human or Robot with the Target Token
If tied, the acting plater may choose which Section Robotic Assassin Steps to
Robotic Assassin is a Robot and can be Downed, Repaired and ignores Hazards. Count as Robot for scoring purposes

name: Stable Wormhole
subtitle: A portal to CERN
setup: Damage Reactor if it isn't already
instructions: Any Items or Characters that are within Vault X or enter Vault X immediately Escape
Things that have Escaped in this manner are Colocated for scoring purposes
If the antimater Escapes through the Stable Wormhole annihilates it and all that have escaped though it

name: Tentacled Monstrosity
subtitle: Animal-plant hybrid with an appetite
setup: Place the Monster in Vault X

abilities.name: Juggernaut
abilities.description: Can Step through Locks (which removes them)

abilities.name: Wary
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked in Dark Sections

instructions: At the end of any Resolve phase, the acting player chooses a Colocated Character or Unpossessed Item to consume, moving it to this card. Consumed Characters cannot act or be interacted with, are Downed if they are Human without a Helmet
If there are no Colocated Characters of Items, Tentacled Monstrosity instead moves one adjacent Character or Unpossessed Item to its Section
If none, then the acting player must Step Tentacled Monstrosity one Section closer to the clossest unconsumed Human (Live or Down)
If tied, the acting player chooses which Section Tentacled Monstrosity Steps to
Tentacled Monstrosity can only be Downed by Fire and has Self-Preservation. If Tentacled Monstrosity is Downed, all consumed Items and Characters are placed into its current Section
